policies: Our travel policies ensure a safe, enjoyable, and transparent experience for all customers. We are committed to providing accurate information, fair pricing, and responsive customer service. All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Please review our terms, refund, and privacy policies for detailed information.
terms: By using our website and booking services, you agree to comply with our terms and conditions. All information provided must be accurate. Bookings are confirmed only upon receipt of payment. We reserve the right to modify itineraries, prices, or services due to unforeseen circumstances. Customers are responsible for obtaining necessary travel documents and insurance. For full details, please refer to our website.
refund: Refunds are processed as per our cancellation policy. Cancellations made 30 days before departure are eligible for a full refund minus processing fees. Cancellations made 15-29 days before departure receive a 50% refund. No refunds for cancellations within 14 days of departure. Refunds are processed within 7-10 business days. Please contact our support team for assistance.
privacy: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. We collect only necessary data to process bookings and improve our services. Your information is never sold to third parties. We use secure technologies to safeguard your data. You may request access, correction, or deletion of your data at any time. For more details, please review our full privacy policy.
